pr_title: DHFPROD-5996: Swap icons with the new ones from attached fonts

timeline.bodyText: @saarimrahman, looks like you're reverting the gray background in the tile headers back to their earlier colors. The bgColor values should all be #F4F6F8 via the following: #4635
timeline.author: wooldridge
